text: Germán Darío Osvaldo Rodríguez (born 25 January 1968) is an Argentinian retired footballer who played primarily as midfielder. ==Club career== Rodríguez began his career at Deportivo Español, moving to Club Olimpo at the beginning of the 1990s. In the spring of 1991 he joined Polish I liga site Lech Poznań, becoming first foreign player in club's history. He made his league debut in 0–0 draw against Olimpia Poznań on 30 March 1991. Representing the club in 1990–91 season Rodríguez made 5 league appearances without any goal scored. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1968 births Category:Argentine footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Argentine expatriate footballers Category:Deportivo Español footballers Category:Olimpo footballers Category:Lech Poznań players Category:Ekstraklasa players Category:Expatriate footballers in Poland Category:Argentine expatriate sportspeople in Poland Category:Sportspeople from Buenos Aires
title: Germán Darío Rodríguez
